recipesJson.name: Breakfast in Paris
recipesJson.author: coilspotting
recipesJson.description:
Like the Stashâ„¢ tea flavor; very nice w/tea/cakes. High notes of bergamot and lavender. No steeping required. Shake and vape. 

Koolada is optional, but gives a nice freshness. Sucralose also optional.

reviews.text: Really good flavor! Didn't have lavender yet.. Mixed with tfa pomegranate this flavor reminds me of a mix of Betty white from uncle junk and the tea flavor from alchemy air. Definitely didn't need to steep. This flavor is amazing with beers I promise. Thank you for the fantastic recipe.
